src:
Danes ponoči zaprta avtocesta med razcepom Nanos in priključkom Senožeče
07 Nov 2019, 09:19 by Spletno uredništvo

V noči na petek bosta predvidoma med 22. in 23. uro ter med 1.30 in 2.30 zaradi zamenjave portala za vodenje prometa popolni zapori primorske avtoceste med razcepom Nanos in priključkom Senožeče proti Kopru.



Fotografija je simbolična. Foto: STA

KOPER > Obvoza ne bo, bo pa avtocesto možno zapustiti na izvozu Razdrto, sporoča Prometno-informacijski center za državne ceste.
text:
The night closed the highway between the Nanos junction and the Senozeče junction at night
07 Nov 2019, 09:19 by Web Editing

On Friday nights, the closure of the coastal highway between the Nanos junction and the Senozeče to Koper junction is expected to be between 10pm and 11pm and between 1:30 and 2:30 due to the replacement of the traffic management portal.



Photography is symbolic. Photo: STA

KOPER> There will be no detour, but the highway will be possible to leave at the Razdrto exit, reports the Traffic and Information Center for National Roads.
